bibl.title: The Roman Occupation of Qasr Ibrim as Reflected in the Greek Papyri from the Site.
bibl.note: 1. Historical context. - 2. A first sample [private letter found in 1980, possibly written during the short occupation of the place by the Roman soldiers in 22-21 BCE].

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Qasr Ibrîm sans No. d'Inv.
Tomasz Derda & Adam Łajtar, The Roman Occupation of Qasr Ibrim as Reflected in the Greek Papyri from the Site.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 105-110.
1. Historical context. - 2. A first sample [private letter found in 1980, possibly written during the short occupation of the place by the Roman soldiers in 22-21 BCE].
